sqls.sql: SELECT rmh_status, rmh_no, part_no, part_idt, rmh_version, rmh_revision, is_default, rmh_desc, factory_no, rmh_type1, rmh_type2, pd_rmh_rmk1, pd_rmh_rmk2, pd_rmh_rmk3, pd_rmh_rmk4, pd_rmh_rmk5, pd_rmh_rmk6, rmh_wkn_num, rmh_wkt_produce, rmh_unit_cost, rmh_mtr_weight, print_times, is_plan, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host FROM pd_rmh WHERE rmh_id = @rmh_id;
